pdb18.gui.multimedia

Class Animal

  • java.lang.Object
    • pdb18.gui.multimedia.Animal

  • public class Animal
extends Object
    The animal class that represents an animal in the real world.
    Author:
    Tomas Aubrecht (xaubre02@stud.fit.vutbr.cz)

      • getFirstAvailableID

        public static int getFirstAvailableID(Connection conn,

                               throws SQLException
